trophies.trophyDetail: Unlock all Trophies.
Survive the first mission of Episode I. Welcome to the nightmare; you survived the beginning—now the real horrors await!
Kill 10,000 enemies in total. You’ve become a decision maker in life and death—congratulations on your lethal math skills!
Gib 666 enemies in total. When it comes to turning foes into pulp, you've mastered the art of gibbing—now that’s what we call a split personality!
Kill 4 enemies with a single sawed-off shotgun blast. Feel the music of carnage—the one-hit wonder you never saw coming!
Destroy 500 destructibles. They called them 'innocent objects', but you've shown no mercy. Who knew a massive stone pillar could crumble so easily?
Reach level 30 with any character. From zero to hero, you've clawed your way to the top—congratulations on dodging death that many times!
Own a total of 5,000 money in your account. You’ve struck gold amidst the horror—now, let's see how you plan to spend it: bullets or bandages?
Unlock 10 weapons. With each weapon unlocked, you’ve built a repertoire of terror—time to spread the love (and lead)!
Unlock 6 spells. Your arsenal just got a mystical upgrade—now let’s see what your enemies think!
Unlock 6 passive abilities. Harness your hidden potential and enhance your skills! Level up to become an unstoppable force.
Purchase 10 upgrades. Evolving in the chaos, you've turned your fears into fierce upgrades—survival of the fittest!
Defeat the boss of Episode I. You’ve faced the epitome of horror—take a bow, survivor. This act is just the beginning!
Finish a mission without taking damage. Unscathed and unafraid, legends are told of your flawless execution. The shadows tremble at your name!
Complete all optional missions from Episode I. Against all odds, you’ve conquered the trials—now you hold the keys to survival!
Track down and defeat the elusive golden spider. With a swift shot, you’ve claimed your prize—the shimmering golden skull coin. The hunt is on, and your prowess shines brighter than gold!
Hit all dead-eye targets in the Temple of the Damned. Precision and skill reign supreme—your aim has carved a path through the shadows of the past!
Claim your first weapon trait. You've taken the first step towards mastering the craft of combat. Now show your enemies what you're truly made of!
Claim 10 weapon traits. You've fine-tuned your arsenal to perfection. Now let your enemies witness the ultimate weapon combination!
Silence 10 Banshees. The Banshees' wails have echoed for too long. Time to put an end to their haunting cries and prove your mettle as a true hunter of the damned!
Survive the first mission of Episode II. The nightmare continues; you've survived the opening act, but the true horrors of Episode II await!

Use the grappling hook to swing onto a ledge 10 metres above you. Soar above the battlefield, guided by the benedictions of the righteous Father Fidelis. Prove your faith can lift you to dizzying heights.
Detonate 20 explosive barrels. You've developed a keen eye for high-yield targets. Use them  to your advantage and show your enemies the true meaning of firepower!
Defeat the boss of Episode II. The Cult's dark master has been vanquished—the world is safe, for now. But the battle is far from over. Brace yourself, for the true test of your mettle lies ahead!
Finish all challenges of Episode II. You have conquered the most daunting challenges that Bloodshed has to offer. Your skills are honed and your resolve is unbreakable.
Wipe out all golden Spiders. It's much easier to sleep when there are no more spiders crawling around out there uncontrolled, isn't it?
Claim your rightful place. A king needs a throne. So what are you waiting for?
Visit the clock tower at 12 o'clock. Twice a day, you have the chance to grab the big prize – be sure to be on time!
Purchase your first consumable item. Now you seem to have acquired a taste for it! You can buy consumable items at any time to make your next run easier.
Purchase a total of 10 consumable items. There's no end to the shopping spree! But these things are really useful, aren't they?
Use 10 Consumable Items. You have mastered the strategic use of consumables to turn the tide of the game—truly a game changer!
Use a Revive to continue your run. The darkness may have claimed you, but you have refused to succumb. Rise, survivor, and continue your bloody crusade!
Unlock all weapons. You have mastered the tools of destruction, now wield them with reckless abandon. Your enemies will tremble before your complete arsenal.
Unlock all spells. Your command of the arcane arts is now unmatched - the battlefield trembles before your might.
Unlock all abilities. You have mastered the very essence of your abilities, pushing the limits of what's possible. The full spectrum of your power is now unleashed—let the true carnage begin!
Defeat every enemy once. You have left no stone unturned, no enemy spared—the entire wretched horde has fallen before your merciless onslaught.
Play your first custom session. You have embraced the first thrill of customized mayhem. Venture forth and create your own path through the carnage.

trophies.trophyName: That's the way I like it
trophies.trophyDetail: Complete all missions in custom mode. This is your domain, your playground of destruction. Revel in the mayhem, for you have proven yourself worthy of the ultimate accolade.
